MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L34 postcode area of Prescot. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.22AM. Our engineers have arrived in the loca area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:18AM on 1st January 2021.
